actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Rail Passenger Service Act of 1970 in order to require a public hearing before the National Railroad Passenger Corporation increases any rate, fare, or charge for passenger transportation.

summary.text: Requires, under the Rail Passenger Service Act of 1970, a public hearing before the National Railroad Passenger Corporation increases any rate, fare, or charge for passenger transportation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Rail Passenger Service Act of 1970 in order to require a public hearing before the National Railroad Passenger Corporation increases any rate, fare, or charge for passenger transportation.
